name: places/ChIJySRtzbFZwokRU2VE2e7yD3o
adrFormatAddress: 344 9th Ave, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Basic, unassuming hardware store stocking janitorial, plumbing & electrical supplies, tools & paint.

originalText.text: Ok place. The owner is slightly rude, slow, everything is expensive and they never have bags for your purchases. Tried to sell me something I didn’t want. Instead of standard. The Asian owner guy doesn’t know the difference in industrial and home either. Sigh…Try someplace else unless you have to go here.

text.text: Ok place. The owner is slightly rude, slow, everything is expensive and they never have bags for your purchases. Tried to sell me something I didn’t want. Instead of standard. The Asian owner guy doesn’t know the difference in industrial and home either. Sigh…Try someplace else unless you have to go here.

originalText.text:
If transforming an otherwise mundane experience into a memorable one is an attribute of a good business, Howard Supply definitely hit nail on the head (pun intended— it’s a hardware store—get it?. :) )

I needed a few odds and ends and a key copied, and was expecting to just trudge to the closest hardware store and call it a day. However, I was pleased to find that the staff was incredibly welcoming and really knew their stuff— they were kind enough to answer all of my stupid questions and make suggestions. Added bonus: everything was immaculately organized and it was super easy to find what I needed.

The owner was even able to replicate a key for me that other hardware stores were unable to make properly— the company who makes my padlock is notorious for being tough to having keys that are tough to get copied correctly, and he was able to do it perfectly in a matter of minutes.

In short— very highly recommended! Truly outstanding customer service. Thank you so much!!

originalText.text: I got mansplained by an employee who had never heard of a portable dishwasher. Never again.

text.text: I got mansplained by an employee who had never heard of a portable dishwasher. Never again.

originalText.text: Not the friendliest and doesn’t know or I should say can’t articulate the difference between bolts and screws.  If you need someone to speak confidently to the inventory they have in stock this is NOT IT!

text.text: Not the friendliest and doesn’t know or I should say can’t articulate the difference between bolts and screws.  If you need someone to speak confidently to the inventory they have in stock this is NOT IT!

originalText.text:
On an environment where they can be rock stars to their neighbors, this hardware shop is mediocre at best.
English is a second language here so expect communication gaps to go with the hiked prices.
